ygData.subject: Re: Skill warning and books
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea same thing for fletching... Here I thought Verant was being nice to us but it was just another trick to make us use more money :).  I persoanly would
ygData.messageBody:
Yea same thing for fletching... Here I thought Verant was being nice to us
but it was just another trick to make us use more money :). I persoanly
would rather have the old way back, costs less and I don't have to spend ALL
my time working on it (What once took 20min to get a point now takes almost
1hour 30min).


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: lukas@... [mailto:lukas@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 9:22 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill warning and books

From: lukas@...

At 10:53 AM 6/22/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Daniel McLarney <d-m@...>
>
>I have a question,
>I am a 22 lvl wizzard with a pretty high INT, and so far I made 6 cams, 4
>mechanical lockpicks,2 stalking probes, 5 compasses which are trivial but
>my skill is not going up. Any ideas? Has anybody ever made a collapsable
>fishing pole or a spy glass?

If you are planning to raise your skill, you might want to forget it at the
moment. Why? As of the last big patch a week ago every trade skill
suffers from a huge increase penalty becuase bakers get the muffin tin back
:P They did that even though the vast majority of trade skill items and
all of tinkering wasn't coded to return items. So if you work on tinkering
you are paying tons more for the same skill increase vs. before the patch
WTG Verant! I urge everyone to /feedback this.

Spyglass is currently broken or requires the fishing pole which there is no
documentation on.


>I have a theory on where other books may be, I think Hero or Meldrath drops
>em (maybe) brcuase the 2 I have talk about mino's through the whole book.
>

A few guildmates killed Meldrath and in their words: "the loot was crap"
Verant still hasn't itemized the majority of high level mobs in the game.

-Luke
